Rule.Name: Avoid unnecessary Enumerable.Count
Rule.Description: Avoid Enumerable.Count in Array or ICollection`1 instance.

Rule.Name: Avoid calling Enum.GetHashCode
Rule.Description: Avoid calling Enum.GetHashCode, since This method requires a cost.
Rule.Resolution: Call GetHashCode after casting to Int32.

Rule.Name: Do make exceptions serializable
Rule.Description: Do make exceptions serializable. An exception must be serializable to work correctly across application domain and remoting boundaries.
Rule.Resolution: Marked a class which inherits the Exception with the Serializable attribute.
